summary: THE ROTORS ARE WARPED ON MY JEEP AFTER LESS THAN 20,000 MILES.  THIS MAKES IT VERY DIFFICULT TO STOP WHEN APPLYING THE BRAKES AND THE ENTIRE VEHICLE SHAKES VIOLENTLY INCLUDING THE STEERING WHEEL.  OBVIOUSLY THIS IS A DEFECT THAT DAIMLER CHRYSLER IS AWARE OF.  TOO BAD THEY WON'T ADMIT IT.  HOPEFULLY IT WILL BE BECOME A RECALL.   *NLM
